protein¶

functions¶

class protein.Protein(protein_name)¶
general_dictionary()¶
Param:self
Returns:there is no return.
Function:insert in mongodb all the information. Protein - Models - Chains - Residue name - Residue Sequence Number - Element symbol - Atom name
get_aminoacid_list()¶
Param:self
Returns:protein
Return type:a dictionary with all the chains, inside of that another dictionary with all the aminoacids that exist and inside of aminoacids a list with all the sequence number that have
get_chain_list()¶
Param:self
Returns:list_differents_chains
Return type:a list with all the chains that may have
get_sequence_aminoacids()¶
Param:self
Returns:sequences
Return type:chain dictionary with aminoacids (one letter)
get_similar_protein()¶
Param:self
Returns:dicc_hit_def
Return type:a dictionary with all the chains as a key, and the value is the most similar protein
